evaluation.scenario_name: Terminal: Request unavailable items, make typos, t

scores.comments: The AI successfully completed the order, fulfilling the customer's intent by switching to burgers when the original items were unavailable. It efficiently handled multiple items and avoided unnecessary repetitions. The AI correctly identified and added the right items and quantities, and the pricing was accurate. The Arabic used was mostly natural and friendly, though there were minor instances where the phrasing could be more fluent. The AI handled unavailable items well by suggesting alternatives and confirmed the order accurately. However, there was a minor oversight in the final session state where customer details were not updated, which could be improved.

```json

  "task_completion": 9,

  "comments": "The AI successfully completed the order, fulfilling the customer's intent by switching to burgers when the original items were unavailable. It efficiently handled multiple items and avoided unnecessary repetitions. The AI correctly identified and added the right items and quantities, and the pricing was accurate. The Arabic used was mostly natural and friendly, though there were minor instances where the phrasing could be more fluent. The AI handled unavailable items well by suggesting alternatives and confirmed the order accurately. However, there was a minor oversight in the final session state where customer details were not updated, which could be improved."
}
```
